# Three Killed in Major Russian Barrage Targeting Ukraine

**Category:** world
**Generated (UTC):** 2025-12-15T05:55:10+00:00
**Published:** Dec 14, 2025
**Publisher:** Euronews

## Summary
A massive overnight Russian barrage struck Ukraine, killing three people and prompting responses from European leaders supporting Zelenskyy. Zelenskyy appeared in Kupyansk despite Russian claims of occupation, as allies push revised peace proposals and sanctions on Moscow.
